head.p: from:Jane to: josh@hotmail.com subject: discrimination in the USA

p.s: So there is an article concerning racism in the USA which I was wondering about because we had a book in my English class and I wanted to figure out if racism is really a still lasting problem there.
First of all it starts with how black people are still a socially disadvantaged group, for example the way of the police how they keep a more careful eye on black people than white people.

EventhoughEven though the Civil Rights Contract have been made 50 years ago, black people are still less favourably treated than white which one could see with how different the maount of white and black people are in things like education, poverty and unemployment.
So what are your thoughts about this?
Did you ever experience racism in any form?
